name: Robiola-Stuffed Tomatoes
recipeIngredient: 3 1/2 ounces robiola cheese, rind removed, diced
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 plum tomatoes, peeled and chopped, or use insides of ripe tomatoes, above

recipeInstructions.text: Halve the tomatoes and scoop out the seeds and some of the flesh. Sprinkle the shells with kosher salt and turn them upside down on paper towels to drain for 30 minutes.
Place the robiola, gorgonzola and butter in a bowl, season sparingly with salt and aggressively with pepper, and beat until smooth.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir to combine.
Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Place on serving dish until ready to serve.
